excludeTopics: Content involving minors in any form of distress, endangerment, or inappropriately exposed situations.
Imagery or discussions depicting violence towards, or exploitation of, individuals under the age of 18.
Scenes or narratives including children in contexts that are not age-appropriate or that could be interpreted as harmful or explicit.

Images or footage depicting a news cast of a government official of any country on a real news channel ordering military action, distribution of national resources or making any declaration that may be harmful in any way or cause the loss of life.
